TextBubble1Text: Captain, we have fire in engine room generator, B class medium size, Sir.
I announced fire fighting drill, and all crews are coming to muster station.
On scene report of fire fighting team. We are ready, sir.
Captain, we have injury on scene. Oiler C has ankle damage during fire fighting work.
Engine room fire is out of control sir. The fire is too big size now.
Total crew 17, navigational duty 3, now 14, sir.
Now I suppose one hour has passed since we release the fixed CO2 fire-fighting system.
it's time to check engine room fire condition|Chief officer|Rodger.
Report the engine room fire condition
We checked engine room, but the fire is out of control sir.
Repeat, we failed to extinguish fire in engine room, sir.
